title: WWG GP Guardian - Opportunity Framework
description: Reframed executive positioning: Building on success, not crisis response

executivePositioning.name: GP Guardian - Margin Improvement Opportunity
executivePositioning.keyMessage: Building on last year's success by making invisible margin visible

coreOpportunity.description: WWGiles has an untapped opportunity to capture £450K+ in annual margin that currently disappears between order booking and payment collection
coreOpportunity.rootCause: Gap between booked GP (4-day storage assumption) and realized GP (12-day average)

businessCase.keyInsight: The gap isn't about performance—it's about visibility. Top-quartile operators have this visibility.

solution.name: GP Guardian

threeCapabilities.name: Track
threeCapabilities.description: Follow GP through Booked → Current → Realized stages in real-time

threeCapabilities.name: Alert
threeCapabilities.description: Flag margin erosion before it becomes a P&L surprise

threeCapabilities.name: Act
threeCapabilities.description: Enable operational intervention while there's still time to protect margin

solution.outcome: Operations discovers problems in time to act. Sales sees true customer profitability. Finance reconciles without surprises.

phases.name: Validate
phases.outcome: Prove the £450K gap with WWG data

theAsk.riskMitigation: If validation shows the gap is smaller than expected, we stop. If it confirms the opportunity, we proceed with confidence.

decisionFramework.question: Do we believe margin visibility enables margin improvement?

ceo.headline: From Good to Great
ceo.message: WWG performed well last year. GP Guardian captures the next level—not by working harder, but by seeing clearly. Every importer faces the booked-vs-realized gap. The ones who close it set the pace.

cfo.headline: Capture the Invisible £450K
cfo.message: GP Guardian tracks Booked→Current→Realized GP, making invisible margin erosion visible. 4-month payback on initial investment.
cfo.focus: Working capital efficiency, cash cycle reduction

coo.headline: Visibility Creates Control
coo.message: End-to-end pipeline visibility from Source→Sold→Paid. Predict margin erosion before it happens. Intervene while there's still time.

salesDirector.headline: Know True Profitability Before You Quote
salesDirector.message: See real customer profitability, not just booked margin. Focus on customers who pay well and on time. AI that helps you win, not police you.

closingStatement.tagline: Visibility creates control. Control creates margin.
closingStatement.summary: WWGiles performed well last year. GP Guardian is about capturing the next level of performance—not by working harder, but by seeing clearly.
